turns.content: Can progressive lenses be added into any type of sunglasses frame?

In most cases, yes, progressive lenses can be added into any type of sunglasses frame as long as the frame is large enough to accommodate the size of the lens. However, some frames may not be suitable for progressive lenses due to their design or shape. It is important to consult with a qualified optician to determine if your sunglasses frames are suitable for progressive lenses.
